root.name: ZP2K9
root.description: OverviewZP2K09 was created by Ska Studios. It was released before the success that The Dishwasher: Dead Samurai and I MAED A GAM3 W1TH Z0MBIES!!!1 would bring in for the studio. Like the mentioned games, it was created with XNA. No one knows what the nonsensical title means.

similar_games.game: I MAED A GAM3 W1TH Z0MBIES!!!1
